com.microsoft.windowsazure.services.servicebus.implementation

Class ServiceBusConnectionString

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.windowsazure.core.utils.ParsedConnectionString
      • com.microsoft.windowsazure.services.servicebus.implementation.ServiceBusConnectionString

  • public class ServiceBusConnectionString
extends ParsedConnectionString
    Class that parses the fields present in a service bus connection string.
